featured.text: Guests may enjoy facilities such as free Wi-Fi, mobile charging, and even a soundless alarm system that raises the sleeping guests into a seated position while gradually brightening the lights.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於表示意願或希望的詞語，通常用於第一人稱。
definition.en_def: A word used to express a desire or intention, typically in the first person.
definition.example: I wish to go to the concert tonight.
